content.query:
Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "mail_receipt"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(100d)
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId
| summarize count() by tostring(mimecastEventId), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| render columnchart kind= stacked

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "mail_receipt"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId, acc=mcast_json.acc, aCode=mcast_json.aCode, Act=mcast_json.Act, Cphr=mcast_json.Cphr, Dir=mcast_json.Dir, Error=mcast_json.Error, SourceIP=mcast_json.IP, MsgId=mcast_json.MsgId, Rcpt=mcast_json.Rcpt, headerFrom=mcast_json.headerFrom, RejCode=mcast_json.RejCode, RejInfo=mcast_json.RejInfo, RejType=mcast_json.RejType, Sender=mcast_json.Sender, SpamInfo=mcast_json.SpamInfo, SpamLimit=mcast_json.SpamLimit, SpamScore=mcast_json.SpamScore, Subject=mcast_json.Subject, TlsVer=mcast_json.TlsVer, Virus=mcast_json.Virus
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(mimecastEventId), tostring(acc), tostring(aCode), tostring(Act), tostring(Cphr), tostring(Dir), tostring(Error), tostring(SourceIP), tostring(MsgId), tostring(Rcpt), tostring(headerFrom), tostring(RejCode), tostring(RejType), tostring(Sender), tostring(SpamInfo), tostring(SpamLimit), tostring(SpamScore), tostring(Subject), tostring(TlsVer), tostring(Virus)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "mail_process"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId
| summarize count() by tostring(mimecastEventId), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "mail_process"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId, acc=mcast_json.acc, aCode=mcast_json.aCode, Act=mcast_json.Act, Hld=mcast_json.Hld, MsgId=mcast_json.MsgId, MsgSize=mcast_json.MsgSize, AttCnt=mcast_json.AttCnt, AttSize=mcast_json.AttSize, AttNames=mcast_json.AttNames, IPInternalName=mcast_json.IPInternalName, IPNewDomain=mcast_json.IPNewDomain, IPReplyMismatch=mcast_json.IPReplyMismatch, IPSimilarDomain=mcast_json.IPSimilarDomain, IPThreatDict=mcast_json.IPThreatDict
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(mimecastEventId), tostring(acc), tostring(aCode), tostring(Act), tostring(Hld), tostring(MsgId), tostring(MsgSize), tostring(AttCnt), tostring(AttSize), tostring(AttNames), tostring(IPInternalName), tostring(IPNewDomain), tostring(IPReplyMismatch), tostring(IPSimilarDomain), tostring(IPThreatDict)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "mail_delivery"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId
| summarize count() by tostring(mimecastEventId), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "mail_delivery"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId, acc=mcast_json.acc, aCode=mcast_json.aCode, Cphr=mcast_json.Cphr, Dir=mcast_json.Dir, Error=mcast_json.Err, DestinationIP=mcast_json.IP, MsgId=mcast_json.MsgId, Rcpt=mcast_json.Rcpt, RejCode=mcast_json.RejCode, RejInfo=mcast_json.RejInfo, RejType=mcast_json.RejType, Sender=mcast_json.Sender, AttCnt=mcast_json.AttCnt, AttSize=mcast_json.AttSize, Subject=mcast_json.Subject, UseTls=mcast_json.UseTls, TlsVer=mcast_json.TlsVer, Route=mcast_json.Route, Snt=mcast_json.Snt, Attempt=mcast_json.Attempt, Latency=mcast_json.Latency, ReceiptAck=mcast_json.ReceiptAck, Delivered=mcast_json.Delivered
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(mimecastEventId), tostring(acc), tostring(aCode), tostring(Cphr), tostring(Dir), tostring(Error), tostring(DestinationIP), tostring(MsgId), tostring(Rcpt), tostring(RejCode), tostring(RejInfo), tostring(RejType), tostring(Sender), tostring(AttCnt), tostring(AttSize), tostring(Subject), tostring(UseTls), tostring(TlsVer), tostring(Route), tostring(Snt), tostring(Attempt), tostring(Latency), tostring(ReceiptAck), tostring(Delivered)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData !has "siem_ttp_"
| where RawData has "ttp_"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId
| where mimecastEventId has "ttp_"
| summarize count() by tostring(mimecastEventId), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData !has "siem_ttp"
| where RawData has "ttp_url"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend userEmailAddress=mcast_json.userEmailAddress, url=mcast_json.url, ttpDefinition=mcast_json.ttpDefinition, action=mcast_json.action, adminOverride=mcast_json.adminOverride, userOverride=mcast_json.userOverride, scanResult=mcast_json.scanResult, category=mcast_json.category, userAwarenessAction=mcast_json.userAwarenessAction, route=mcast_json.route, similarDomain=mcast_json.similarDomain, heuristicDomainSource=mcast_json.heuristicDomainSource
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(userEmailAddress), tostring(url), tostring(ttpDefinition), tostring(action), tostring(adminOverride), tostring(userOverride), tostring(scanResult), tostring(scanResult), tostring(category), tostring(userAwarenessAction), tostring(route), tostring(similarDomain), tostring(heuristicDomainSource)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "ttp_attachment"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend result=mcast_json.result, senderAddress=mcast_json.senderAddress, fileName=mcast_json.fileName, actionTriggered=mcast_json.actionTriggered, route=mcast_json.route, details=mcast_json.details, recipientAddress=mcast_json.recipientAddress, fileType=mcast_json.fileType
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(result), tostring(senderAddress), tostring(fileName), tostring(actionTriggered), tostring(route), tostring(details), tostring(recipientAddress), tostring(fileType)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData !has "siem_ttp_"
| where RawData has "ttp_impersonation"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend senderAddress=mcast_json.senderAddress, recipientAddress=mcast_json.recipientAddress, subject=mcast_json.subject, definition=mcast_json.definition, hits=mcast_json.hits, identifiers=mcast_json.identifiers, action=mcast_json.action, taggedExternal=mcast_json.taggedExternal, taggedMalicious=mcast_json.taggedMalicious, senderIpAddress=mcast_json.senderIpAddress
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(senderAddress), tostring(recipientAddress), tostring(subject), tostring(definition), toint(hits), tostring(identifiers), tostring(action), toboolean(taggedExternal), toboolean(taggedMalicious), tostring(senderIpAddress)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "audit_auth"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId
| summarize count() by tostring(mimecastEventId), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "audit_auth"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend mimecastEventId=mcast_json.mimecastEventId, mcType=mcast_json.mcType, user=mcast_json.user, app=mcast_json.app, src=mcast_json.src, action=mcast_json.action, method=mcast_json.method, auditType=mcast_json.auditType, category=mcast_json.category, id=mcast_json.id
| distinct TimeGenerated, tostring(mimecastEventId), tostring(mcType), tostring(user), tostring(app), tostring(src), tostring(action), tostring(method), tostring(auditType), tostring(category), tostring(id)

union Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "threat_intel_feed_csv_customer"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend key=mcast_json.key, FileMimeType=mcast_json.FileMimeType, FileName=mcast_json.FileName, FileSize=mcast_json.FileSize, MD5=mcast_json.MD5, Observations=mcast_json.Observations, RecipientAddress=mcast_json.RecipientAddress, Route=mcast_json.Route, SHA1=mcast_json.SHA1, SHA256=mcast_json.SHA256, SenderAddress=mcast_json.SenderAddress, SenderDomain=mcast_json.SenderDomain, SendingIP=mcast_json.SendingIP
| distinct TimeGenerated, toint(key), tostring(FileMimeType), tostring(FileName), toint(FileSize), tostring(MD5), tostring(Observations), tostring(RecipientAddress), tostring(Route), tostring(SHA1), tostring(SHA256), tostring(SenderAddress), tostring(SenderDomain), tostring(SendingIP)
| summarize count() by tostring(SHA256), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

union Mimecast_mail_CL
| where RawData has "threat_intel_feed_csv_grid"
| extend mcast_payload = substring(RawData, 20)
| extend mcast_json=parse_json(mcast_payload)
| extend key=mcast_json.key, FileMimeType=mcast_json.FileMimeType, FileName=mcast_json.FileName, FileSize=mcast_json.FileSize, MD5=mcast_json.MD5, Observations=mcast_json.Observations, Route=mcast_json.Route, SHA1=mcast_json.SHA1, SHA256=mcast_json.SHA256, SendingIP=mcast_json.SendingIP
| distinct TimeGenerated, toint(key), tostring(FileMimeType), tostring(FileName), toint(FileSize), tostring(MD5), tostring(Observations), tostring(Route), tostring(SHA1), tostring(SHA256), tostring(SendingIP)
| summarize count() by tostring(SendingIP), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
